summary: The story of two men, one married, the other the lover of the other's wife, who meet in the trenches of the First World War, and how their tale becomes a microcosm for the horrors of war.
cast: Romuald Joubé|Maxime Desjardins|Séverin-Mars|Angèle Guys|Maryse Dauvray|Mancini|Elizabeth Nizan|Pierre Danis|Blaise Cendrars|Paul Duc
keywords: french soldier|trench warfare|dead soldier|romantic triangle|army of the dead
title: Yo acuso
